title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally via a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package adding Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with multi-model conversations, code highlighting, RAG uploads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, custom timeouts, model management.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain to chat with local PDFs/docs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with fuzzy model search, progress bars, history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model for private autocomplete & chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling & PVC model cache.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app (Rust + React) for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate code, refactor, or chat with local Ollama models inside the editor.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of Docker Compose stacks combining Ollama with Open-WebUI, Nextcloud, n8n, Flowise, etc.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client library for Ollama with strongly-typed models, dependency-injection helpers, and streaming.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official registry of community-contributed Modelfiles for Llama 3, Phi-3, CodeLlama, Vicuna, etc.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers users via Ollama models; supports slash commands, threads, role gating.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama; tokio-based, serde models, embeds support, examples.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app with session memory, model selector, and file upload RAG using Ollama backend.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on selected notes or selections via Ollama for summarization, Q&A.
